channel.title: Node.js on Ryan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Ryan's Blog

item.title: Deploy a React project on AWS EC2
item.description: 1. Background Recently, I developed a full stack project with friends, including React front-end and Express back-end, stored in a GitHub repository. I want to launch and deploy this project now. For React projects, there are many free deployment platforms, such as Vercel and DigitalOcean. But considering that this project includes both the front-end and back-end, consider deploying them in one place. After consulting many materials, it was decided to
